headline: Thoughtful eBay Brand Belles Books & Gifts Brings Nostalgia to Life Under Founder Danielle Vataj
summary: PLEASANTVILLE, NY / ACCESS Newswire / January 20, 2026 / Belles Books & Gifts, a fast-growing eBay-based retail brand founded by entrepreneur Danielle Vataj, is redefining online shopping through thoughtfully curated products that celebrate nostalgia, ...
